text: Table 3 Modifications to standard extracorporeal circuit required for DHCA Inline infusion bags for collection and storage of blood during haemodilution A centrifugal pump—in preference to a roller pump—to reduce haemolysis Incorporation of a haemofilter to enable haemofiltration Incorporation of a leucocyte-depleting filter A cardiotomy reservoir of sufficient capacity to accommodate the circulating volume during exsanguination before DHCA Arterio-venous bypass and accessory lines to permit retrograde or SACP An efficient heat exchanger Consideration of use of heparin-bonded tubing
